name: Portable Headpiece Drop
descr:
This versatile drop headpiece is the same headpiece which is used at the portable table, featuring a forward motion drop and a straight drop with adjustable tension control and cocking lever. The wide stabilization base distributes the weight and applied forces across a broad area when used on cushioned surfaces.

Specifications: 31x25x10 cm.

Available as standard in black and other colours available of extra charge and time of delivery.
